tasks.label: publish
tasks.command:
cls
dotnet build -c Release
if (Test-Path -Path '.\Output') {rm -R '.\Output'}
mkdir '.\Output\kebinImports\Editor\Scripts' > $null
mkdir '.\Output\kebinImports\Editor\Resources' > $null
cp -R '.\package.json' '.\Output\kebinImports\package.json' > $null
cp -R '.\Editor\Resources\*' '.\Output\kebinImports\Editor\Resources' > $null
cp -R '.\bin\Release\net481-windows\kebinImports.dll' '.\Output\kebinImports\Editor\Scripts\kebinImports.dll' > $null
cp -R '.\LICENSE.md' '.\Output\kebinImports\LICENSE.md' > $null
cp -R '.\CHANGELOG.md' '.\Output\kebinImports\CHANGELOG.md' > $null
cp -R '.\README.md' '.\Output\kebinImports\README.md' > $null
cp -R '.\Third Party Notices.md' '.\Output\kebinImports\Third Party Notices.md' > $null
rm -R bin
rm -R obj
